name: HELP! I AM A BAT...
description:
Get ready for the best bat simulator on this page right now!

*UPDATED GAME FILE!!!*

I wanted to make a Ronseal game (does exactly what it says on the tin) and THIS IS IT!

W/UP ARROW = up

S/DOWN ARROW = down

Press BOTH TOGETHER to do a biologically-accurate bat-boost!

Everything made by Atomic Toilet e xcept:

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

which I remixed with extra jazz beatz. And the font, actually, which is a C64 typeface.

You can hear the full remix theme below! 

[I write music as Cardboard Dead Boy, which you can hear more of HERE].

This was made for the 8 Bit 2 Button Jam, and as such featured three original songs by Joshua McLean that served as inspiration. The three songs had the themes of '2 buttons', 'Lights Out' and 'Running'...so of course the game only uses two buttons, is set at night and has the player 'running' somewhere. Wheeeeeeee!
